messages.subject: Shinsengumi Cameo in 2008 Taiga

messages.messageBody:
yahoo decided to log me out as I was posting my original message
let me try again

Please read
http://p214.ezboard.com/ftheninjadojo89233frm3.showMessage?
topicID=1320.topic

it is about the 2008 Taiga Atsuhime
http://wiki.d-addicts.com/Atsu-hime

in which the Shinsengumi are supposed to appear in a cameo role
fear not there is a *possibility* of the reuniting of the original
NHK cast---obviously from 2006-2008 some changes may happen and
nothing is set in stone

some shinsengumihq.com updates (thank you Hirotada)
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/updates.htm

pop-culture related updates will go on our blog
http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/
I am substituting for our regular maintainer---but I've been very
busy lately sorry
